short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 一款无与伦比的阿里云DataWorks快捷搜表扩展，让您可以在Chrome Omnibox上直接输入关键字并转跳至数据地图。
short.en_US: A extraordinary search tables chrome extension, let you input keywords and redirect into DataWorks DataMap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
开源地址 https://github.com/datafe/datamap-omnibox-chrome-extension
1. 只需于 Chrome URL 框上打 dmc+Tab键 (或dmc+空白键) 即可呼起使用。
敲入关键字、地域名及表类型，即跳至对应地域的数据地图，并填入搜索文字，如 hangzhou holo test，代表在杭州地域搜索 test 的 Hologres 表，而且插件会记住此次使用的地域与表类型，下次直接搜关键字即可。
2. 支持右键选取文字进行搜索，固定数据地图搜索地域与表类型的方式可参考上一步。

若需要更进阶的搜表能力，如在 URL 框上直接打接口搜表，可参考此插件 https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%91-dataworks-%E6%90%9C%E8%A1%A8/pchandealfkoepcpkddkijpfiglgjkgi?hl=en
long.en_US:
Open Source: https://github.com/datafe/datamap-omnibox-chrome-extension
Only you type dmc and tab key (or dmc and space key) in chrome URL bar.
1. typing dmc and tab key (or dmc and space key) in chrome URL bar
2. input region, table type and table keywords and press enter
ps: This extension caches current used region and table type, you can type keyword only to trigger search next time.

Otherwise, support using context menu to select text and into search.

If you want advanced search features, such as search remote table results in Chrome URL input, you can install this extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%91-dataworks-%E6%90%9C%E8%A1%A8/pchandealfkoepcpkddkijpfiglgjkgi?hl=en
